data.message: I think that gay marriage is outrageous and is wrong

replies.message: i believe you are an idiot!
I completely agree with you Josh.
Josh....let me correct you....it's not even marriage....marriage = Man + women......America just wants to make us think they can put gay and marriage together...it's pathetic.
eric i agree with you!!! people like josh sam and matt need to stop being dickheads and start being equal
Eric, you're the only idiot....attacking people's opinions.
I think your face is outragious and wrong
But Matt you just did the same thing :(
I love how the haters are on both sides refuse to see themselves for what they are.....too ready with a snarky quip for the other side....

May be your opinion Matt, but thankfully. your opinion means nothing to gays or anyone for that matter because it's there life, has zero effect on your life whatsoever. You aren't going to suddenly die when you see a gay person, you aren't going to go bankrupt. You have your life, they have theres. Stop judging others and live your own life. Honestly. anyone who acts like gays shouldn't have any rights act just like Hitler Germany. Grow up, and worry about yourself. not others.
Don't get gay married then.. or attend a gay wedding. That way, you wont be so outraged.
Hey mr robertson you only think that because no gay guy in his right mind wouldn't look at you twice...p.s.get a life....xx
